sentences.english: His bragging is just a front for his insincerity.
sentences.chinese: 她的自吹自擂不过是不真诚的幌子。

sentences.english: Rub, is a mere Akiko, is attracting you herring and others.
sentences.chinese: 搓，只不过是个晃子，是个吸引你注意力的幌子而己。

sentences.english: It is my conviction that killing under the cloak of war is nothing but an act of murder.
sentences.chinese: 我坚信，打着战争幌子的杀伐，不过是谋杀而已。

sentences.english: I just do these gigs as a cover; I have other sources of income.
sentences.chinese: 这个工作只是个幌子，我有其他收入来源。

sentences.english: This is an unfair position in which doctors place patients, under the guise of empowering them.
sentences.chinese: 医生在给患者授权的幌子下使他们处于不公平的地位。

sentences.english: Somebody opens the hotel for the shop sign, gamble in the village mainly.
sentences.chinese: 有的人是开酒店为幌子，主要是开赌庄。

sentences.english: Don’t base your awe of them on their aphorisms.
sentences.chinese: 不要将你的敬畏建立在他们的幌子之上。
